channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13338] Differences in vectorized_casts.q output for vectorized and non-vectorized runs
item.description: Turn off vectorization and you get different results.
item.summary: Differences in vectorized_casts.q output for vectorized and non-vectorized runs

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
